attributes.action: STOP! Funding other countries, Great Britian can't even fund itself, Other countries that we fund don't like us anyway!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our country formerly "Great Britian" is seriously in the red, to much money is going abroad to other countries. Britian in the world today is hated, so why are we creating hardship for our own by giving away money to people that don't even like us!
